exceptions.tactic: intros a k H1 H2 H3.
intros a' k H1 H2 H3.
intros a' k' H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R k : R H : k < 1 H0 : forall n : nat, a n <> 0 H1 : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (a (S n) / a n)) k Unable to unify "{l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => sum_f_R0 ?M2371 N) l}" with "forall eps : R, eps > 0 -> exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (n >= N)%nat -> R_dist ((fun N0 : nat => sum_f_R0 (fun n0 : nat => Rabs (Rabs (a n0))) N0) n) k < eps".

original: intros a k H1 H2 H3. apply ex_series_Rabs. apply ex_series_lim_0 in H3. apply ex_series_Reals_1. exists k. apply Alembert_C1. + intros n. apply H2. + apply H3.
